path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/METAVILL LIFE Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions add(uint256 _allocPoint, …), set(uint256 _pid, …) and updateEmissionRate() could invoke massUpdatePools() function, that can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.

findings.title: add function issue
findings.description: If some LP token is added to the contract twice using function add, then the total amount of reward in function updatePool will be incorrect.
